title: Why are the IGNOU registration details not showing the details of the second year? - Quora

response.answer_text: I faced the same problem. Here is what I did to resolve that. I went to the following link: https://onlinerr.ignou.ac.in/ I selected “I have read and understood the instructions given above.” I clicked on “Proceed for Re-registration”. I entered my login details. Here, I could see the updated details. May be the page on the main profile of IGNOU is not carrying the updated information but this link will work.
